name: FCON (Freenet Classic OpenNet)
short_description: The continuation (aka fork) of the 0.5 Freenet opennet network. FCON allows anonymous, distributed, encrypted messaging and file transfers. This project aims to improve the overall usability and security of the Freenet 0.5 network.
